mapper.select: SELECT i.instore_no , i.instore_date , i.item_div , i.item_code , i.instore_quantity , i.outstore_quantity , i.stock_quantity , i.facilities_div_no , i.lot_no , i.instore_manager , i.ordering_detail_code , i.instore_div , i.instore_div_no , i.expiration_deadline , od.standard , od.unit , od.outstore_company , m.member_no , c.company_name FROM ordering_detail od JOIN instore i ON od.ordering_detail_code = i.ordering_detail_code JOIN member m ON m.member_no = i.instore_manager JOIN company c ON m.member_no = c.company_no ORDER BY i.instore_no

SELECT o.outstore_no , o.outstore_date , o.outstore_quantity , o.outstore_manager , o.orders_detail_no , o.instore_no , o.sales_no , od.standard , od.unit , od.outstore_company , od.instore_company , i.item_div FROM orders_detail od JOIN outstore o ON od.orders_detail_no = o.orders_detail_no JOIN instore i ON o.instore_no = i.instore_no ORDER BY o.outstore_no

SELECT o.ordering_date , od.ordering_ingredient , od.ordering_product , od.quantity , od.standard , od.unit , os.outstore_quantity , i.item_div FROM ordering o JOIN ordering_detail od ON o.ordering_code = od.ordering_code JOIN instore i ON od.ordering_detail_code = i.ordering_detail_code JOIN outstore os ON i.instore_no = os.outstore_no WHERE od.outstore_company = #{outstoreCompany} ORDER BY o.ordering_date

SELECT i.instore_no , i.instore_date , i.item_div , i.item_code , i.instore_quantity , i.outstore_quantity , i.stock_quantity , i.facilities_div_no , i.lot_no , i.instore_manager , i.ordering_detail_code , i.instore_div , i.instore_div_no , i.expiration_deadline , od.standard , od.unit , od.outstore_company , od.ordering_product , m.member_no , c.company_name FROM ordering_detail od JOIN instore i ON od.ordering_detail_code = i.ordering_detail_code JOIN member m ON m.member_no = i.instore_manager JOIN company c ON m.member_no = c.company_no WHERE c.company_name = #{companyName} ORDER BY i.instore_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO outstore (outstore_no , outstore_date , outstore_quantity , outstore_manager , orders_detail_no , instore_no , sales_no) VALUES ('OU-' || TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd') || '-' || (SELECT GETSEQ('outstore','outstore_no') FROM dual) , sysdate , #{outstoreQuantity} , #{outstoreManager} , #{ordersDetailNo} , #{instoreNo} , #{salesNo})
mapper.select: SELECT i.ingredient_name , p.product_name FROM ingredient i JOIN product p ON 1 = 1
